recipeInstructions.text: Whisk together water, sugar, and yeast. Add in flour and salt just until dough comes together. Transfer dough to a lightly-greased bowl and let rise for 1 hour.
Preheat oven to 400F. Turn dough out onto lightly-floured parchment paper and roll into large rectangle.
Spread pizza sauce over dough until 1 inch from edges. Top with pepperoni, desired fillings, and sprinkle with cheese.
Roll up dough and transfer to a baking sheet. Brush with egg and sprinkle with parmesan and parsley. Bake for 20-25 minutes until golden. Serve hot with extra pizza sauce.
